caption.p: Validation of structure prediction for Ag-clusters. Comparison of the predicted and true ligand-metal interface structures of protected Ag-clusters: a Ag 23(SR) 18(PPh 3) 8, b Ag 44(SR) 30, c Ag 78(SR) 42(DPPP) 6, and d Ag 211Cl(SR) 71(PPh 3) 6. For predicted clusters Ag–S bonds are drawn in green and true Ag–S bonds in yellow whereas Ag–P bonds are drawn in magenta for predicted structure and in pink for the true structure. In panel ( d) chlorine atom is drawn with light blue color
